entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of drizzle overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
